unlock_api_to_gain_access: Unlock our private APIs to get access to non-public information and resources about the Scottish Seabird Company.
import_data: Import open banking and accounting data
upload_data_for_more_recent_report: Got access to internal account not yet public? Upload them to add them to our analysis and create a more recent report.
using_environmental_indicators: Using environmental indicators we can assess the outlook of a companies impact.
data_on_company_governance: Data on company governance and problematic shareholders / directors.
data_on_activities: Using machine learning models we can analyse a companies website to determine the companies advertised activities and highlight the probable industries it operates in.
no_esg_results_found: No results found for this company.
no_parents_found: This company is not a subsidiary.

bond_rating_descriptions.D: Has defaulted on obligations or WiserFunding believes that it will generally default on most or all obligations
bond_rating_descriptions.CC: Significant probability of default in the near future
bond_rating_descriptions.CCC-: Moderate probability of default in the near future
bond_rating_descriptions.CCC: Significant risk of default in case of adverse economic conditions
bond_rating_descriptions.CCC+: Low profitability, low liquidity and debt-heavy.Moderate risk of default in case of adverse economic conditions
bond_rating_descriptions.B-: Low profitability, low liquidity, with debt â€“heavy capital structure
bond_rating_descriptions.B: Less profitable, lower liquidity and higher proportion of debt. More likely to face difficulty in meeting financial obligations in case of adverse economic conditions
bond_rating_descriptions.BB: Less profitable, lower liquidity and higher proportion of debt. May face some difficulty in meeting financial obligations in case of adverse economic conditions
bond_rating_descriptions.BBB-: Less profitable, decreased liquidity or increased proportion of debt. More susceptible to adverse economic conditions
bond_rating_descriptions.BBB: Slightly less profitable firms, decreased liquidity or increased proportion of debt
bond_rating_descriptions.BBB+: Profitable, liquid and equity-heavy, but more susceptible to adverse economic conditions
bond_rating_descriptions.A: Strong, profitable firms with sufficient liquidity and equity-heavy capital structure

profitability_positive: An efficiently run company making a good return on assets.
profitability_negative: Assets are not being used as profitably as they could.
governance_template: In the last 12 months there were {judgements} judgements and {paymentRemarks} payment remarks for this company.
benchmark_template: The credit risk is {sector} the average for this sector and {region} the average for {country}
for_a_more_reliable_report_supplement_th: For a more reliable report you can supplement the data in this report with recent management accounts using the button below.
reliable_turnover: The results could be improved with more recent data.
reliable_volatility: The company's financials have some volatility.
reliable_assets: The companies fixed assets are lower than expected.
caution_turnover: The company is only just big enough to fit into the proven range for our model to operate on.
caution_volatility: The company's financials have been too volatile.
caution_assets: The company has submitted abridged reports.
concern_turnover: There are not enough years of financial data available for this company.
concern_volatility: The company's financials have been too volatile.
concern_assets: The company is too small for a reliable report to be created.
this_person_is_risk_relevant_name: This person's name is similar to a risk relevant name.
there_are_names_that_are_the_same_or_sim: There are names that are the same, or similar to, a risk relevant name.
